sentence.Network_en: In the main, the Eisenhower administration did not try to inveigle Kennedy into underwriting it's policies.
sentence.Network_cn: 总的说来, 艾森豪威尔政府并没有设法诱骗肯尼迪在它的政策上签字画押.

sentence.Network_en: With patience and diplomacy, she can eventually inveigle him into marrying her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她靠耐心和交际手腕, 到头来是能引诱他与她结婚的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... inveigh 漫骂>口头支持 inveigle 诱骗>直接要求 invidious 惹人反感的>有益的.
网球王子忍足谦也_新网球王子资料_wqwz.52pk.com ... Hide－－ 隐藏 Inveigle－－ 诱惑 Jocosity－－ 戏谑.
instigate vt. 唆使, 怂恿inveigle vt. 诱骗, 骗取retaliate vt. 就…进行报复
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... snuggle 挨近，依偎 inveigle 诱骗，诱使 dangle 悬挂，吊胃口.

list.abs: they inveigled her into buying a dress which she didn't really need .他们诱惑她买下了一条她并不真正需要的裙子。
He inveigled her out of her money and love ., 他骗取了她的钱和爱情.
She inveigled a promise from her boss ., 她骗取了上司的允诺.
The saleswoman inveigled the poor girl into buying two hats ., 那女店员哄着那可怜的女孩买了两顶帽子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'beguile, deceive'; formerly also as enveigle): from Anglo-Norman French envegler, alteration of Old French aveugler 'to blind', from aveugle 'blind'

entry.def: If you inveigle someone into doing something, you cleverly persuade them to do it when they do not really want to.

example.ex: She inveigles Paco into a plot to swindle Tania out of her savings.
example.tran: 她引诱帕科一起合谋来骗取塔妮娅的积蓄。

means.word_mean: 1. influence or urge by gentle urging, caressing, or flattering;

auth_sentence.content: Black legs...inveigle silly yokels with greasy packs of cards in railroad cars.

auth_sentence.content: Later, I inveigle a dashing young soldier to touch me by letting me try on his watch.

sentences.en: to inveigle a free pass to the screening of the new film
sentences.cn: 用哄骗的方式得以免费观赏这部新电影
